contentrichtext.text: '''Hollow Man''' or '''The Hollow Man''' may refer to: *[[The Hollow Man (1935 novel)|''The Hollow Man'' (1935 novel)]], a locked room mystery novel by John Dickson Carr *[[The Hollow Man (1992 novel)|''The Hollow Man'' (1992 novel)]], a science fiction novel by the US writer Dan Simmons *[[The Hollow Man (2011 novel)|''The Hollow Man'' (2011 novel)]], a London-based crime thriller by Oliver Harris *[[Hollow Man (film)|''Hollow Man'' (film)]], a 2000 science fiction film inspired by H. G. Wells' ''The Invisible Man'' *''[[Hollow Man 2]]'', the film's 2006 sequel, starring Christian Slater *[[Hollow Man (song)|"Hollow Man" (song)]], a 2008 single by American alternative rock band R.E.M. ==See also== *[[The Hollow Men (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
